mapper.insert: insert into tb_board_demo(bidx, title, contents, userid, writedate, moddate, hitcnt, board_kind, file_bidx) values(board_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{contents}, #{userid}, sysdate, sysdate, 0, #{board_kind}, null)
mapper.select: select bidx, title, userid, writedate, moddate, hitcnt, board_name from tb_board_demo board, tb_board_kind_demo kind where board.board_kind = kind.board_kind order by bidx desc

select bidx, title, userid, writedate, moddate, hitcnt, board_name from tb_board_demo board, tb_board_kind_demo kind where board.board_kind = kind.board_kind and board.board_kind = #{board_kind} order by bidx desc
mapper.update: update tb_board_demo set hitcnt = hitcnt+1 where bidx = #{bidx}
update tb_board_demo set title = #{title}, contents = #{contents} where bidx = #{bidx}
